description: The major events in Japan's long history, from the clan society of about 800BC to today's parliamentary government. The influence of Buddhism and other cultural elements from Asia; the impact of Western technology; and how the shifting powers of priests, nobles, Shogun and Emperor have affected the destiny of this vigorous island nation.
